title: 10-Day Vietnam Grand Tour: Phu Quoc, Danang, Hoi An, Hanoi & Halong Bay Wonders
highlights: Explore the entertainment complex on Phu Quoc and the safari.
Discover the beauty of Hoi An ancient town and the Marble Mountains.
Marvel at the Golden Bridge in Ba Na Hills.
Experience the unique Hanoi Train Street and visit the Temple of Literature.
Enjoy an overnight cruise in Halong Bay, including kayaking and cave exploration.
Visit Ninh Binh, including Hoa Lu ancient capital and Trang An.
description: Embark on an enchanting 10-day journey through Vietnam, unveiling its diverse landscapes and rich cultural tapestry. Begin your adventure in Phu Quoc, where pristine beaches meet vibrant entertainment. Journey to Danang and Hoi An, exploring ancient towns and majestic mountains. Experience the cultural heart of Hanoi, strolling through historic streets and visiting iconic landmarks. Conclude your odyssey with an unforgettable overnight cruise in Halong Bay, surrounded by stunning limestone karsts. Enjoy the scenic beauty of Ninh Binh and the historical capital of Hoa Lu. This meticulously crafted tour ensures an immersive experience filled with unforgettable memories. From bustling cities to serene bays, discover the essence of Vietnam on this grand adventure.
audioSummary:
Speaker 1: Welcome to your spectacular 10-day Vietnam Grand Tour! Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of Vietnam, from Phu Quoc to Halong Bay.
Speaker 2: Picture this: pristine beaches, ancient towns, bustling cities, and breathtaking landscapes. Are you excited yet?
Speaker 1: Your adventure begins in Phu Quoc, where you'll explore Grand World.
Speaker 2: Next, you will be transferred to Danang and experience the Marble Mountains.
Speaker 1: Explore Hoi An, visit the Japanese Covered Bridge, and immerse yourself in the local culture.
Speaker 2: Visit the Golden Bridge and enjoy panoramic views.
Speaker 1: Hanoi is your next destination, where you'll stroll through the historic Hanoi Train Street and visit the Temple of Literature.
Speaker 2: Then it's time for an unforgettable overnight cruise in Halong Bay, with kayaking and cave exploration.
Speaker 1: Concluding your trip, immerse yourself in the historic beauty of Ninh Binh.
Speaker 2: Ten days of cultural immersion, scenic beauty, and unforgettable moments – this is your Vietnam Grand Tour.
Speaker 1: Ready to explore Vietnam? Let's begin!
summary: 10-day Vietnam Grand Tour: Explore Phu Quoc, Danang, Hoi An, Hanoi, and Halong Bay. Includes cultural sites, luxury cruise, and historical landmarks. 4-star hotels provided.

itinerary.title: Phu Quoc Arrival - Grand World
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at Phu Quoc International Airport, you will be greeted by our driver holding a sign with your name. After collecting your luggage, you'll be led to your awaiting vehicle for a transfer to your hotel. Check-in time is typically 14:00, and early check-in is not included. You'll have the opportunity to visit Grand World Phu Quoc, an entertainment complex. Explore the Teddy Bear Museum, observe bears from different continents, and watch the Quintessence of Vietnam show, showcasing Vietnamese culture. Experience the charm of Venice with a boat ride and explore other attractions like the BamBoo House and Urban Park. Remember, tickets for Teddy Bear Museum, Quintessence of Vietnam show, and Venice boat ride are at your own expense. Explore the shopping mall, enjoy meals at the restaurants, and create memories. Overnight in Phu Quoc.
activities: Arrival at Phu Quoc International Airport
Shopping and dining at Grand World

itinerary.title: Vin Wonder & Vin Safari
itinerary.description: Start your day with breakfast at the hotel. Experience the magic of VinWonders, an enchanting theme park nestled on Phu Quoc, with an extensive array of attractions and thrilling rides. Explore Vinpearl Safari Phu Quoc, a popular attraction known for its diverse range of animals, an open zoo concept, and interactive experiences. You'll get to enjoy animal shows and the semi-wild safari area. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

itinerary.title: 4 Island & Cable Car
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast and get picked up by our guide. Start your tour at 8:15 - 8:30 AM. Arrive at the An Thoi harbor. Join the speed boat for a sightseeing tour of the four most famous islands south of Phu Quoc. Experience Xuong Island (or Buom Island) snorkeling to see the coral reefs. Visit Gam Ghi Island and continue snorkeling. May Rut Trong Island: lunch - check-in - chilling out by the beach. Option Seawalker activity is optional. Swim in turquoise water, relax on a sunbed, and order your favorite drinks. Aquatopia Water Park on Thom Island and explore the concept of 6 zones. Cable Car Thom Island is one of the longest three-wire cable car in the world and from above you will see the turquoise sea, islands, fishing village & boats, and Sunset Town. Return to your hotel at 17:30. Overnight in Phu Quoc.
activities: Speed boat tour to four islands
Lunch at May Rut Trong Island

itinerary.title: Danang by Flight - Marble Mountain - Coconut Forest - Hoi An Ancient Town
itinerary.description: Have breakfast at the hotel. After check-out, you will be transferred to the airport for your flight to Da Nang. 13:30: You will be picked up at the rendezvous, and start visiting the Non Nuoc Village at the foot of Marble Mountains. The village is famous for stone sculptures and handicrafts. Admire works of art made from stone and marble, visit religious places, and explore caves such as Tang Chon cave. Afterward, visit Bay Mau Coconut Forest. 16:00: Take a basket boat to visit the eco-system of the forest, catch crabs, and make toys from coconut leaves. Participate in a basket boat race (self-funded). 17:30: Move to Hoi An ancient town, visit the Japanese Covered Bridge and ancient houses. Walk around the lantern street and shop at Nguyen Hoang night market. 19:00: Enjoy dinner at the local restaurant. Return to Danang at 20:00-20:30 and end of the services at your hotel.
activities: Shopping at Nguyen Hoang night market

itinerary.title: Ba Na Hills - Golden Bridge
itinerary.description: In the Morning, have breakfast at the hotel then your guide and driver will pick you up from your hotel, depart for Ba Na Hill through one of the most beautiful seaside streets of Central Vietnam. Experience the cable system up to the top of the hill and enjoy the beautiful sight of Mo stream, Toc Tien waterfall. Visit Hand of the gods hold Vietnam's Golden Bridge. Sightseeing on Ba Na Hill to: L'Jardin Zone with French Architecture Building: Tinh Tâm Garden, French Stable, one hundred year-old pomelo tree, Old Villas, Linh Ung Pagoda, 27 meters Buddha Statue, Loc Uyen Garden. Visit Nui Chua Peak - the rooftop of Da nang City and enjoy the Buffet lunch on Ba Na Hill. Continue the tour with Fantasy Park – one of the most modern indoor game centers of the Asia. Finally visit Linh Chua Linh Tu temple and view of the whole of Da Nang city. Go down by the cable system and return the city center at around 17h00. Free time to explore Da Nang nightlife.

itinerary.title: Hanoi by Flight - Half Day City Tour - Train Street
itinerary.description: Have breakfast at the hotel. After check out, our car will transfer you to the airport for the flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival in Hanoi, get picked up by our friendly guide and start to explore Hanoi City. Visit the Temple of Literature, built in 1070 by King Ly Thanh Tong, known as Vietnam's first university, dedicated to Confucius and scholars. Leave for Hoa Lo Prison Museum, used by French colonists for political prisoners and later by North Vietnam for U.S. prisoners of war. Visit Hanoi Train Street, a highlight of the city tour, where real railway lines run through the street with homes and businesses opening out onto the tracks. Transfer to your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter.

itinerary.title: Hanoi - Ninh Binh - Hoa Lu - Trang An
itinerary.description: Get picked up by our friendly guide and head to Ninh Binh city. Visit Hoa Lư, the ancient capital of Vietnam between 968 and 1010. Learn about Vietnamese history in the feudal system under the Dinh, Le, and Ly Dynasties. Visit Trang An, recognized by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site in 2014. Trang An features a tunnel cave system, used in the film 'Skull Island'. The boat trip of 2.5 hours will let you witness its beauty. Then you will get back on the car to return to Ha Noi and Get dropped off at your hotel in Ha Noi old quarter.

itinerary.title: Hanoi - Halong Bay - Overnight on Cruise
itinerary.description: Have breakfast at the hotel. Between 07:45 and 08:30, you will be picked up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter and transferred to Ha Long. (For guests booking a Limousine Bus or shuttle bus only.) Upon arrival at Tuan Chau International Cruise Port between 11:30 and 12:00, you will enjoy a warm welcome by our cruise staff in the waiting lounge and complete the check-in procedure. At 12:30, you will board the Le Journey Premium Cruise, where the crew will welcome you with a refreshing drink and cold towel before checking you into your cabin. The vessel leaves Tuan Chau Marina, taking you on an exciting journey to discover the beauty of Ha Long Bay. Enjoy the view of beautiful spots and limestone islands while heading to Surprising Cave.

itinerary.title: Halong - Hanoi
itinerary.description: Enjoy your lunch at our luxurious restaurant on board while the vessel cruises toward Surprising Cave. Explore the Surprising Cave. After that, visit Titop Island for swimming and climbing. Back on board, you will participate in Sunset party & cooking class while the vessel cruises toward the shore. Enjoy the view while sipping Vietnamese tea. You will be instructed to make delicious Fresh Spring rolls. After dinner, enjoy a peaceful view of the Bay from the sundeck and some drinks at Sky Bar. Wake up on the Sundeck with Tai Chi and enjoy breakfast and begin cruising to the Natural Preservation Area. Also you may enjoy some Kayaking in Halong Bay. You will then check out and enjoy lunch. Arrive back to Tuan Chau Marina.
activities: Participate in Sunset party & cooking class

itinerary.title: Hanoi Departure
itinerary.description: Have breakfast at the hotel and then check out. Our car will pick you up to depart to Noi Bai International airport. Spend time at your leisure until your transfer to the International Airport for departure. Goodbye Vietnam.
activities: Transfer to Noi Bai International Airport

accommodation.name: Phu Quoc Hotel
accommodation.details: Phu Quoc arrival day 1 and multiple nights.

transportation.title: Airport pickup & drop off
transportation.details: 3 Adults, 1 Child 10YO – 16 SEATER CAR pickup & drop off airport. 7 SEATER CAR for private tour

transportation.title: Hanoi - Halong Bay
transportation.details: Hanoi - Halong Bay by shuttle bus

inclusions: Private transfers for Airport Transfer round ways.
English speaking guide for tour only (Other languages please mention with extra cost)
One bottle of mineral water per person per day of tour.
exclusions: (Please give 1 photo 4*6 with white background & Passport Page).
Clients must check if their countries need to do visa to enter Vietnam or not, we will not have any responsibilities if they can't enter into Vietnam because of without visa.
Early check in, check out are not guaranteed & subject to extra charge.
Extra charges, personal expenses drinks, souvenirs, laundry, mini-bar in hotel, etc.
Surcharge for peak season if any (upon booking).
notes: Other Meals like Indian food or other special foods, should be charged with extra cost.
If you want to change LUNCH to DINNER please pay for extra cost of transportation (Apply for Private tour only)
Small deviations in the tour program are sometimes necessary, depending on weather, road conditions, flight schedules and room availability.
